entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023
